name: Dr. Sujal Patel
description: Prosthodontics expert with vast experience in handling complex and critical cases involving full mouth rehabilitation, implants and crown. Always focussed on creating natural-looking restorations, helping patients regain confidence through custom implants, crowns, bridges and dentures. As a certified Prosthodontist, provides cutting-edge dental solutions, from implant dentistry to advanced prosthetics, designed to restore and enhance your smile.

name: Dr. Tulasi Patel
description: Endodontics expert with mastery in single sitting complex Root Canal procedures and tooth conservation. Specialized in Minimally Invasive Techniques for Effective Tooth Preservation. Saving Teeth with Precision-Driven Endodontic Procedures and Advanced Care. Providing Superior Endodontic Care for Long-Lasting Dental Wellness.
